mapper.select: select count (*) from viewlog where viewlog_date like sysdate
select count(*) from viewlog group by viewlog_date having viewlog_date<=sysdate and viewlog_date>=(sysdate-5) order by viewlog_date asc

select sum(count) from (select viewlog_date ,count(*) as count from viewlog group by viewlog_date having viewlog_date <=last_day(sysdate) and viewlog_date >=last_day( add_months(sysdate,-5) ) order by viewlog_date asc) group by extract(month from viewlog_date ) order by extract(month from viewlog_date ) asc

select count(*) from viewlog group by extract(year from viewlog_date) having extract(year from viewlog_date) <= extract(year from sysdate) and extract(year from viewlog_date) >= (extract(year from sysdate)-4) order by extract(year from viewlog_date) asc
